sentence.Network_en: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他帮助激励和动员了全国数百万人。

sentence.Network_en: The thermonuclear reactions of the sun energize the human body.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳的热核反应给人类以能量.

sentence.Network_en: To worry is often to energize needlessly.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 是激励(Energize)，是鼓舞团队的能力。 第二个 E 是激励是胆识(Edge)，决策就需要有果断力，敢于不同的勇气。
第二个“E”是激励别人的能力（Energize） 这也是一种积极向上的活力，它可以让其他人加速行动起来。 激励别人并不是只会做慷慨激 …

entry.tran: 使充满活力;使精力充沛
entry.def: To energize someone means to give them the enthusiasm and determination to do something.

example.ex: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation...
example.tran: 他帮助激励和动员了全国数百万人。

example.ex: I am completely energized and feeling terrific.
example.tran: 我充满了活力，感觉非常好。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to be alert and energetic;
2. raise to a higher energy level;

auth_sentence.content: However, it has failed to come up with a leader and program to energize its base.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, it has failed to come up with a leader and program to energize its base.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, it has failed to come up with a leader and program to energize its base.

auth_sentence.content: China's real-estate boom helps energize the domestic economy and keeps miners from Australia to Brazil flush with cash.
auth_sentence.res_content: China's real-estate boom helps energize the domestic economy and keeps miners from Australia to Brazil flush with cash.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: China's real-estate boom helps energize the domestic economy and keeps miners from Australia to Brazil flush with cash.

auth_sentence.content: Falling flash prices and field data, however, has begun to energize the data center market.
auth_sentence.res_content: Falling flash prices and field data, however, has begun to energize the data center market.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Falling flash prices and field data, however, has begun to energize the data center market.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精力旺盛的;积极的;有力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: energy[n.活力,精力;能,能量]+etic属于……的→energetic精力旺盛的
an无+ergy能量,活动→n.[医]无反应力,无力
en进入+ergy能量,活动→充满力量
energy[n.活力,精力;能,能量]+ize表动词→energize给与……能量

sentences.en: New forces are energizing all about us.
sentences.cn: 新的力量活跃在我们四周。

sentences.en: We are energized by love if we put our energy into loving.
sentences.cn: 如果我们付出能量去表现爱意，爱就会使我们充满活力。
